item.title: Setup TFC workspace
item.description: Setup Terraform workspace Change directory to the root directory. cd terraform-aws-vpc/ Change to deploy directory cd setup_workspace. Execute terraform Run to following commands in order: terraform init Export Terraform Config Location export TERRAFORM_CONFIG="$HOME/.terraform.d/credentials.tfrc.json" terraform apply -var-file="$HOME/terraform.tfvars". Change to the deploy folder cd ../deploy terraform apply -auto-approve

item.title: Deploy VPC into TFC
item.description: Deploy Terraform in workspace Change directory to deploy dir (previous command auto generates backend.hcl) cd ../deploy terraform apply or terraform apply -var-file="$HOME/.aws/terraform.tfvars". Terraform apply is run remotely in Terraform Cloud
